queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/run/containerd/containerd.sock' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/run/containerd/containerd.sock' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/docker' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/docker' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/run/docker.sock' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/run/docker.sock' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/sys' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/sys' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/dev/disk/' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/dev/disk/' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation is undefined

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.volumeMounts.name={{containerdsock}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.volumeMounts.name={{containerdsock}}.readOnly is undefined

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/run/containerd/containerd.sock' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/run/containerd/containerd.sock' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/sys' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/sys' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run/docker.sock' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run/docker.sock' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/docker' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/docker' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/dev/disk/' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/dev/disk/' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.runAsUser is 0 and 'runAsNonRoot' is false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.runAsUser is undefined

queries.query_name: Docker Daemon Socket is Exposed to Containers
queries.description: Sees if Docker Daemon Socket is not exposed to Containers

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.volumes.name={{dockersock}}.hostPath.path should not be '/var/run/docker.sock'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.volumes.name={{dockersock}}.hostPath.path is '/var/run/docker.sock'

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop is undefined

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.readinessProbe should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.readinessProbe is undefined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.containers.name=release-name.securityContext should be set
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.containers.name=release-name.securityContext is undefined

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=release-name has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=release-name does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is undefined
